scripts.start: npm run build-wasm && concurrently -k -n "VITE,RUST" "vite" "npm run watch:wasm" || (npm run print-building-help && exit 1)
scripts.profiling: npm run build-wasm-profiling && concurrently -k -n "VITE,RUST" "vite" "npm run watch:wasm-profiling" || (npm run print-building-help && exit 1)
scripts.production: npm run build-wasm-prod && concurrently -k -n "VITE,RUST" "vite" "npm run watch:wasm" || (npm run print-building-help && exit 1)
scripts.build: npm run build-wasm-prod && vite build || (npm run print-building-help && exit 1)
scripts.build-profiling: npm run build-wasm-profiling && vite build || (npm run print-building-help && exit 1)
scripts.print-building-help: echo 'Graphite project failed to build. Did you remember to `npm install` the dependencies in `/frontend`?'
scripts.print-linting-help: echo 'Graphite project had lint errors, or may have otherwise failed. In the latter case, did you remember to `npm install` the dependencies in `/frontend`?'
